about.description:
Hello, my name is Yuzen. I am currently a fourth-year student in the Information Management program at National Taichung University of Science and Technology. My primary expertise lies in programming (C++, TS) and front-end web development.

My hobbies include swimming, running, and fitness, and I am currently focusing on the field of machine learning.

Through my coursework and project experience at university, I have built a solid foundation in programming, which has ignited my long-term passion for software engineering and applied research.
